Text:
I just got through reading this, and the story description above (which I copy-and-pasted from DC's official site) is not what is actually in this issue.

Typical DC bullshit. Their editors are pitiful right now. (IMO thanks to that jack-off Bob Harras.)

Anyway, basically this month Superman and Superboy confront Luthor in his prison cell. Then the Justice League shows up. Fairly boring issue, honestly. Nice art though!
